expert_traj.observation: You are in the middle of a room. Looking quickly around you, you see nothing.
You arrive at loc 29. On the sinkbasin 1, you see a dishsponge 2, a egg 3, a mug 1, and a spoon 2.
You arrive at loc 17. The microwave 1 is closed.
You open the microwave 1. The microwave 1 is open. In it, you see a egg 1.
You arrive at loc 31. On the garbagecan 1, you see a apple 3, a apple 2, and a papertowelroll 1.
You pick up the apple 3 from the garbagecan 1.
You arrive at loc 17. The microwave 1 is closed.
You heat the apple 3 using the microwave 1.
You arrive at loc 31. On the garbagecan 1, you see a apple 2, and a papertowelroll 1.
You put the apple 3 in/on the garbagecan 1.
